price: Suka ce: "Tallahi! Bã zã ka gushe ba, kanã ambaton Yũsufu,* har ka kasance Mai rauni ƙwarai, kõ kuwa ka kasance daga mãsu halaka."
arabic: قَالُواْ تَٱللَّهِ تَفۡتَؤُاْ تَذۡكُرُ يُوسُفَ حَتَّىٰ تَكُونَ حَرَضًا أَوۡ تَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡهَٰلِكِينَ
footnotes: * Mai tsõhon laifi bã ya son ya ji anã ambatonsa, sabõda haka ('yan'uwan Yũsufu) suke zargin bãbansu da ambaton (tuna) Yũsufu.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qālū tal-lahi tafta-u tadhkuru yūsufa ḥattā takūna ḥaraḍan aw takūna mina al-hālikīna
